declaration.author: dom hofmann / Loot community
declaration.text: Feel free to use Loot in any way you want.
declaration.scope: All Loot content — items, text, generated bags

supporting.note: 'intentionally omitted for others to interpret' — strong open-use intent, not a formal CC0 declaration
SPDX: MIT license on Solidity code only. No content CC0 declaration in contract.

risk_notes: No explicit CC0 declaration found from dom hofmann for the NFT content itself. 'Feel free to use in any way you want' is strong intent and has been acted on by a large builder community without challenge, but it is not a formal CC0 waiver. Contract is MIT (code only). Commercial confidence should be medium, not high, when citing Loot assets.
notes: Loot is widely treated as CC0 by the builder community and dom has not contested any derivatives. The risk is legal — 'feel free to use' is not a copyright waiver. Include with medium confidence and document the distinction. Do not represent as formally CC0.
